frontmatter.description:
Fired when a user:
Clicks the right-mouse button when the pointer is over a selection box on a PropertyManager page.
Selects
Clear Selections
on the short-cut menu.

title: DModelViewEvents_UserClearSelectionsNotifyEventHandler
description:
